Text: I can't get this to work whatever I do... When I try to start a race, it just loads for a while and then stops... help?

User Type: * Mount the F1_2011.mdx DVD-Image in vIDE of DAEMON Tools Pro Advanced 4.41.0315
* In Device Parameters of vIDE set the DVD Region to 'not set'
Username: or attach vIDE to physical device
